alert.note: Alert for Coastal Calhoun; Coastal San Patricio; Inland San Patricio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 14 at 2:46PM CST until January 15 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 6 PM CST MONDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 expected. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 26 possible. * WHERE...Inland San Patricio, Coastal San Patricio and Coastal Calhoun Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 3 AM to 6 PM CST Monday. For the Freeze Watch, from Monday evening through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Calhoun; Coastal San Patricio; Inland San Patricio
